duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft legal briefs in connection with dispositive and discovery motions.
Conduct legal research on complex and sophisticated issues.
Operate independently and think critically when presented with complicated and novel legal issues.
Experience in federal court and with investor-related lawsuits, securities litigation, insurance recovery, and/or class actions.
Demonstrate commitment to pro bono work.
Work in a collegial and busy environment.
Willingness to work and learn is valued.
Get involved in a business at an early and growing stage.
